title: COVID-19 news conference today: Gov. Roy Cooper eases restrictions on NC bars, lifts Stay-At-Home orders for gyms, other businesses
content:
1. COVID-19 news conference today: Gov. Roy Cooper eases restrictions on NC bars, lifts Stay-At-Home orders for gyms, other businesses  WTVD-TV

localize.title: COVID-19新闻发布会今天。罗伊-库珀州长放宽了对北卡罗来纳州酒吧的限制 取消了对健身房和其他企业的 "家庭旅馆 "令
COVID-19新聞發佈會今天。羅伊-庫珀州長放寬了對北卡羅來納州酒吧的限制 取消了對健身房和其他企業的 "家庭旅館 "令
